meanings.definition: A synthetic rubber material used in wetsuits and other water-resistant products.
meanings.sent1: The wetsuit was made of neoprene to keep the diver warm in the cold water.
meanings.sent2: Neoprene is commonly used in making gloves for scuba diving.
meanings.sent3: The neoprene seal on the wetsuit decided to take a vacation and went surfing on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her love for swimming was like neoprene, always flexible and resilient.
meanings.sent5: The smell of neoprene brought back memories of adventurous dives in the deep blue sea.

meanings.definition: To make something out of neoprene material.
meanings.sent1: She decided to neoprene a new laptop sleeve for her computer.
meanings.sent2: Neopreneing a custom phone case can be a fun DIY project.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer neoprened a stylish dress that was both waterproof and trendy.
meanings.sent4: His creativity soared as he neoprened a futuristic-looking backpack for his travels.
meanings.sent5: Neoprening a picnic blanket made outdoor gatherings more comfortable and enjoyable.
